Class PropertyEditHandle<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.model.AbstractModel
      • com.composum.pages.commons.taglib.PropertyEditHandle<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model, com.composum.sling.core.SlingBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checkbox, CodeArea, DateTimeField, DimensionWidget, Hidden, MultiValueWidget, NumberField, OptionsWidget, PathField, PositionWidget, RichText, Slider, StaticText, TextArea, TextWidget
    public class PropertyEditHandle<T>
extends AbstractModel
    a special model to handle properties and property values during editing in an i18n context
